item.title: Creating a Honeypot with T-Pot
item.description: SummaryTpotce is an all-in-one honeypot platform with a collection of honeypots and tools for monitoring them. Requirements 8GB RAM 128GB Disk Space Unfiltered Internet Access Isolated Subnet Promiscious Mode Enabled for fatt, suricata and p0f to work properly Port forward or NAT to the honeypot InstallationSet up is simple as the ISO is prebuilt. Download the latest ISO from Tpotce releases Mount the ISO to a VM and run through the installer.
